website_summaries.verdict: An ideal product for parents who love the idea of its solid wood construction and having 3 items in 1.
pros: A solidly constructed bassinet that offers the convenience of three products in one: a removable Moses basket and changing table in addition to the bassinet
It stands out for its sturdy wooden frame
cons: The changing table feature is somewhat flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Quality Bassinet, Love It!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bassinet and used it until my daughter was 5 months. I found it to be very sturdy and she slept well in it until she was too tall for it. She is big for her age or we could have kept her in it longer. I liked the color scheme its very neutral. I used the under storage for extra diapers and blankets. My favorite part was that the basket pulls out. I took the basket with me outside so she could sleep while her sister played on her playset. Overall I found it to be a great purchase and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: michwent

customer_reviews.title: Nice basic bassinet
customer_reviews.text: Nice basic bassinet. Wobbles a bit when 2 year old climbs on it, but feels sturdy enough to keep the little baby safe. Wheels make it easy to move around. I liked being able to use the basket in different places if necessary. Put it next to me on the bed for the 1st week he was home and transitioned onto the base next to our bed. Mattress is thin, but never seemed to affect his comfort level.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient / Awesome quality
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what we would do without this. We love it. Love how you can disconnect the bassinet and replace it with the changing table. We keep the bassinet outside (We live in SD) and she falls asleep in it outside. We use the changing table inside and pack it with everything we need since baby is co-sleeping. LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bassinet. We're keeping my son in our room ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bassinet. We're keeping my son in our room until he's a little older, the bassinet isn't too large to fit. Love that we can roll it room to room, or take out the bed to use as a Moses basket. Lots of storage to contain baby items.
customer_reviews.author: Sisha P.

customer_reviews.title: Simply the Best
customer_reviews.text: This bassinet is perfect - sturdy, safe, storage, everything! We just love this bassinet! We ordered another that was flimsy and basically awful! This one is exactly what we needed. I bought it for my new grandson and it's fantastic or so my kids tell me! It comes with a changing table built in as well as plenty of storage. It's large enough (length and width) to accommodate even a large baby. I suspect it will be used for several babies before it's retired. Absolutely stellar!
customer_reviews.author: Dal Asher

customer_reviews.title: I love the little canopy and it appears to be of ...
customer_reviews.text: I ended up co-sleep in with my baby so unfortunately I did get to use this except maybe one night... I would have preferred something more user friendly for the nursing mom.... hard to keep her close to me in my case. I love the little canopy and it appears to be of okay quality but I feel I could have gotten something better for the price when all said and done
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. Easy to assemble and looks great!! It's a great cream color. The chair is beige and the bed cover is white in my pic. Update - He quickly outgrew this bassinet as it became very wobbly with his weight. If I could go back, I would have assembled it with wood glue. I got so many compliments on it that we now use it for storage in the babies room.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Contours Classique 3-in-1 Bassinet
customer_reviews.text: Son and daughter-in-law LOVE it. About to have second child and space is limited so this is a perfect fit for them. My son said it was easy to assemble and my daughter loves all the detail and storage space. They are happy so grandma is too!
customer_reviews.author: Yellah51

customer_reviews.title: Baby sleeps good!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bedside bassinet! Good storage! I don't really use the changing station part. But I use it as an extra shelf for more storage ! Great buy! Would by lost without this!
customer_reviews.author: Alaigia Eiffel

customer_reviews.title: Thin matress
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good item but the matress is very thin and baby can hurt his/her back if u dont put smth under the matress -or another matress .....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bassinet!
customer_reviews.text: Such a wonderful bassinet!!! I love the sleek modern look, the changing area is sooo easy to attach and so practical to have with the mini diaper stacker that connects. The rollers move effortlessly and are so quiet. The in and out basket is a genius idea. Absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great till shes ready for the full size cot lots ...
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for my new grandaughter , was well made, great till shes ready for the full size cot lots of places for spare bedding ,nappies and creams. has wheels so you can push it from one room to another always brought moses baskets before for all my seven granchildren wish they had seen this before
customer_reviews.author: sue chaudhuri

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: My mother in law purchased this for my new grandson and my son and his wife are so please with it. They love how it can be changed around and about and how nuetral the color is that it just blends so well.
customer_reviews.author: MrsjHyde

customer_reviews.title: Overall loved this but the changing table only lasted a week
customer_reviews.text: Overall loved this but the changing table only lasted a week. We had to purchase a permanent one. It ended up being for the best as trying to make the transition in the middle of the night with only one arm (crying baby in the other) was getting to be a bit much for me.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and easy to put together. Honestly have not used it as a changing table because we just use the couch with a blanket but the bassinet is nice for naps and the storage is very useful for all the diapers.
customer_reviews.author: kaya

customer_reviews.title: Using for our second too
customer_reviews.text: We used this with our first daughter and plan on using it with our second. It was really nice having the Moses basket as we could travel with it when #1 was really small and felt a Pack and Play would be too big. We didn't use the changing portion as much as I thought we would. But all-in-all it is a really good bassinet. Pretty sturdy and although we didn't use the storage we did used the diaper section for middle of the night changes (on the bed honestly). I would suggest that others!
customer_reviews.author: Laura McCants

customer_reviews.title: It is good quality and wasn't too difficult putting it all together
customer_reviews.text: This bassinet fits in perfectly with my earthy home decor... It is good quality and wasn't too difficult putting it all together. I can't wait to see my new grand baby laying it soon. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this! It is super easy to put together ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! It is super easy to put together very sturdy and great to move from room to room. Love the Moses basket and diaper changing table options. Beautiful cherry color.
customer_reviews.author: JESSICA MYERS

customer_reviews.title: Best side crib I bought
customer_reviews.text: Best side crib I bought, and it holds up really good,I bought this for just the looks, but I'm impressed with the quality and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Rubi Moriarty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for breastfeeding moms
customer_reviews.text: We love this! It's so easy to use. The wheels make it so convenient plus it's a good size so baby won't grow out of it right away. My son is 2 mos and still uses this and has plenty of room. It makes a perfect co sleeper for nursing moms!
customer_reviews.author: Kam

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this! Worth the money! Five stars!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful bassinet! Sturdy, well-made, easy to assemble, and a perfect option for preemies as well as regular newborns. This Bessonette could be used for an extended period of time as the first sleeping option. Absolutely love this! Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Myndsai

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought for family member and they love the sturdiness of this bassinet. definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kymie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My wife couldn't be more happier with this bassinet. Good quality, easy to assemble etc.. whenever I go away I just take with me the top that way I don't have to worry about a crib wherever I go.
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: ... a little small and seems flimsy but over all love
customer_reviews.text: The storage section on the side is a little small and seems flimsy but over all love it
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Was a gift and better than expected. Bought a second one as a gift also.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter in law wanted this for their first baby. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: simple

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and pretty easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't all that difficult to put together on my own...probably took me about an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ella

customer_reviews.title: Great Bassinet To Have
customer_reviews.text: Love this bassinet combo. The detachable bassinet is by far the best feature. Very well made, nice and sturdy. Underneath storage is a bonus too. Easy to assemble, would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchase it for my great grandchild and her mom was quite pleased with it thank you Amazon once again
customer_reviews.author: Delia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love this bassinet. I purchased this for my a family member they couldn't be more pleased. They did complain it was hard to assemble, but I think that was more just them than the product directions.
customer_reviews.author: Susana Rivas

customer_reviews.title: love the wood finish
customer_reviews.text: Right size for our 600sq ft apartment, love the wood finish, love the storage space, feels elegant although is an economic buy.
customer_reviews.author: madballoonist

customer_reviews.title: Great Bassinet!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great value!!!!!! So happy I picked this for my child!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hagit Marciano

customer_reviews.title: nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: nice for the price, a little nicer than I expected, sturdy, wheels around evenly, not cheap looking, my daughter is very pleased, makes for a wonderful shower gift for Moms-to-be! Nice addition to the nursery, attractive and practical.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Agonis

customer_reviews.title: The bassinet itself is very nice and big
customer_reviews.text: The bassinet itself is very nice and big, I can fit it in my room and still have space available, only thing is that it kind of wobbles after a while so you have to keep screwing the bassinet to keep it safe for baby.
customer_reviews.author: Hadja

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for my niece. She absolutely loves it! She is 8 months pregnant and put it together herself with ease.
customer_reviews.author: J_Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: This bassinet come very useful for my new baby. It is a bassinet and a changing table as well. You will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Reefer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with look of Bassinet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson that is on the way in March. I am happy with it and so is my daughter inlaw, but the real test with be when it gets used. The wood is very nice quality!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice bassinet but it arrived with someone damage to the wood.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline L.

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and great design!
customer_reviews.text: I had given this Bassinet to my niece as a present and they love it! This was an easy set up and the multi-function design makes the bassinet easy to roll around with the attached wheels. Being able to pull the bassinet out from the base and moving it from room to room is another great quality. Best selling point for me was the price point on Amazon. It was way cheaper than the selling price on the Babies R Us website.
customer_reviews.author: SD 619

customer_reviews.title: so far i love it. my baby is not here to enjoy ...
customer_reviews.text: so far i love it . my baby is not here to enjoy yet. its lovely to look at and easy to use. my husband assembled it with no problem. for sure much better than all of the ones i looked at in Babies r us and ByeBye baby.
customer_reviews.author: ashley fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: Second time Impirchased this item for a shower gift. Great item!
customer_reviews.author: Deb Rutherford

customer_reviews.title: It was cracked...
customer_reviews.text: I love the bed!! But I when I got it, some of the frame was cracked. Unfortunately I do not have time to send it back. So my husband fixed it. In general it's great. Lots of storage etc.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: it was a gift - the recipients love it! it is exactly what they wanted - ...
customer_reviews.text: it was a gift - the recipients love it! it is exactly what they wanted - thank you -
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bassinet
customer_reviews.text: The bassinet is a nice product. It is well made and attractive. My husband assembled it and the directions were pretty good. It did take over an hour to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Stude10

customer_reviews.title: Practical and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and very functional bassinet! I love it !
customer_reviews.author: diamondia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cant wait to use it!
customer_reviews.text: Great design, very practical There were some issues with the item being slightly damaged but as I needed to be ready for when bub comes, i was offered and accepted a partial refund.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Good bassinet
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I liked this bassinet. I like the versatility of it that I could use it as just a Moses basket too. The storage underneath and on the sides is really nice. I never attempted to use the changing pad as we had a changing table set up in the nursery next to our room. We only used it for three weeks and then put our son in his crib, but it worked out well while we had it. I liked how it didn't take up much space as our bedroom as space is at a premium. I gave it four stars since the bassinet sheets that I bought separately didn't seem to fit this bassinet mattress well.
customer_reviews.author: SuperAng

customer_reviews.title: bought it for my sis' s first baby.
customer_reviews.text: Sister loves it and gets a lot of use. Now buying one for me and our new baby since my sis raves about it.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Cordero

customer_reviews.title: Its great for small
customer_reviews.text: my baby is 4 months and still fits.. Its great for small bedroom
customer_reviews.author: maricella

customer_reviews.title: Nice bassinet
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to put together..but the wife and I figured it out. Product is sturdy and looks more expensive than it is. Really worth it for the price we paid. Can't wait to try it out when our daughter arrives. :)
customer_reviews.author: Mahin Khan

customer_reviews.title: Adaptable design and slim fit for bedside
customer_reviews.text: Slim profile and wheels make it ideal for the bedside. Nice storage. Flexible design allows for changing table and ability to move Moses basket.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Horvath

customer_reviews.title: Contours Classique 3-in-1 Wood Bassinet
customer_reviews.text: Thanks, this choice was great! My daughter-in-law love it. Conviently for grandbaby, and comfortable for positioning and all that she needs is a reach.
customer_reviews.author: geneva liggins

customer_reviews.title: The perfect addition for our new addition
customer_reviews.text: The perfect addition for our new addition. I love the way the light passes through the translucent fabric. One minor complaint is that the changing station can be a bit cumbersome and none of this can be done one-handed, but the quality of the product is substantial, so you can't expect it to be feather light.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Williams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This the best product you can buy worth every dollar.
customer_reviews.author: Man

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: fast shipping good quality, easy to assemble all around a great buy, our son will be sleeping in it happily and the conversion and moses basket feature are an awesome bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Nsalas2

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this bassinet! It is so cute and perfectly functional. I love that I can move it from room to room if needed. I even pulled out the bassinet and took it with me on a camping trip! Worked wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Looks better in picture
customer_reviews.text: While the wood frame is quite impressive, the quality of the bassinet itself is very shoddy. The material pictured on the side is actually akin to a thin shower curtin. The bassinet where baby lays is very thin, and flimsy. If I had seen this product before I bought it, I would not have purchased it. Very deceiving is the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Demarco

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter and her mom (my daughter) loved this baby shower gift
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter and her mom (my daughter) loved this baby shower gift. It worked really well in the master bedroom. Hopefully they keep it for baby number two :-).
customer_reviews.author: Ms G

customer_reviews.title: A waste
customer_reviews.text: This was not worth the money. It was hard to put together. The fabric is awful. My baby has never even slept in it. I don't trust it
customer_reviews.author: PUP DOC

customer_reviews.title: Need to sell 2 if you are interested
customer_reviews.text: Our twins are to big for these anymore and were perfect at the time. Very nice to have near when the babies were small.
customer_reviews.author: Freda Hale

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bassinet, but I'd recommend getting a better mattress for it. The one it comes with is very thin and plastic, so it doesn't seem very comfortable, and my son often got sweaty all down his back. I folded a blanket underneath it, which seemed to help him get comfy. The changing table part is great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: good purchase
customer_reviews.text: i ordered this product expecting the worst (since there were reviewers that got poor packaged items) but upon speedy arrival i found all the pieces were present and in perfect shape. i'm 9 months pregnant and had no problem putting this together myself :) would deffinately recommend this to a friend!!
customer_reviews.author: askanderson

customer_reviews.title: Wood Bassinet Contours Classique
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this cradle for our new Grandaughter and it's wonderful. It rolls anywhere, it's safe and we are purchasing another for our second Grandchild on the way.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: I got this because i loved the wood and how sturdy it looks
customer_reviews.text: I got this because i loved the wood and how sturdy it looks, but one of the wheels no longer fits into the socket and squeaks like crazy and i constantly have to tighten the frame to the bassinet. Other than that the other features saved this from being a total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Bassinet
customer_reviews.text: My new granddaughter born on Christmas day! Very sturdy, easy to assemble, and looks great. The neutral color a real plus. Goes well with any décor. Has a lot of room for baby essentials.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Bufford

customer_reviews.title: great look, easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my new grandson. My daughter assembled it by herself and loves it. She says its sturdy, looks great and is the perfect height.
customer_reviews.author: DuMac63

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Missing parts, I had to go back and forth with manufacture, gave up and returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Muayad

customer_reviews.title: Nice little bassinet...if you can get parts that aren't broken.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little bassinet unfortunately when I received it both end pieces were split at the joints between the uprights and cross pieces. One end even had a noticeable chip out of, no pieces were found in the packaging so it was clearly packed broken. I emailed the company to get replacements and waited 3 days before I ended up calling to get new pieces. Got the pieces in and one of them is split although this one is just cosmetic damage. Also both pieces didn't include the inserts in the bottom of the legs for the casters. I'd send the whole thing back if I wasn't overseas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Contours Classique Wood Bassinet, Orion
product_meta.description:
Classique Wood Bassinet, Orion

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Classique bassinet offers classic style, convenient features and elegant fashions for contemporary moms. A full-size bassinet, Moses basket and changing table all in one extends the use of the product.
feature_bullets: Solid wood frame in dark cherry finish provides elegance and stability
Handles on removable Moses basket allows you to easily carry baby anywhere in the house
Changing table securely attaches on top of bassinet and conveniently clips underneath bassinet when not in use
Hanging deluxe storage organizer and diaper stacker keeps baby's items handy
Quilted and padded interior with mesh side windows provides good air flow

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars140 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
